data.prayer: God, guide the 6,813 believers in Aisne to multiply spiritual families that love you, love each other, and make disciples.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Aisne, Hauts-de-France, France
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in Aisne who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Aisne, Hauts-de-France, France.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Aisne to agree with you and with one another.
Lord, please remember the Arab, Tunisian people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the county of Aisne to agree with you in prayer.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the people of the the county of Aisne to be consumed with longing for your Word at all times, like David.
data.verse: My soul is consumed with longing for your laws at all times.

data.section_summary:
the county of Aisne, Hauts-de-France, France has a population of 554,500.

We estimate Aisne has 6,813 people who might know Jesus, 339,088 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 208,599 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 81 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the county of Aisne to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

location.name: Aisne
